mapper.sql: advertisement_id AS advertisementId,monitor_user_id as monitorUserId, company_id AS companyId, user_id AS userId, lontitude, latitude, serial_num AS serialNum, ad_type AS adType, address, ad_spec AS adSpec, ad_content AS adContent, has_leader_portrait AS hasLeaderPortrait, remark, audit_response AS auditResponse, ad_status AS adStatus, status, modify_time AS modifyTime, create_time AS createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT ad.serial_num, ad.advertisement_id, ad.lontitude, ad.latitude, ad.address, ad.ad_content, u.`name`, c.company_name, pf.path
,round(6378.138*2*asin(sqrt(pow(sin( (#{lat}*pi()/180-latitude*pi()/180)/2),2)+cos(#{lat}*pi()/180)*cos(latitude*pi()/180)* pow(sin( (#{lon}*pi()/180-lontitude*pi()/180)/2),2)))*1000) AS juli
FROM advertisement ad LEFT JOIN company c ON ad.company_id = c.company_id LEFT JOIN t_user u ON u.user_id = ad.monitor_user_id left JOIN pic_file pf on (pf.busness_id=ad.advertisement_id and pf.type=3 and is_first=1)
ad.`status` = 1 and c.`status`=1
AND ad.ad_status =5
AND ad.ad_spec=#{adSpec}
AND ad.ad_type=#{adType}
AND ad.company_id=#{companyId}
AND (c.company_name like CONCAT("%",#{keyWord},"%") or ad.address like CONCAT("%",#{keyWord},"%") or ad.serial_num like CONCAT("%",#{keyWord},"%"))
group by ad.advertisement_id order by
juli ASC,
serial_num+1 asc, ad.create_time desc

SELECT COUNT(1) as num,
ad_type
ad_spec
FROM advertisement
and company_id=#{companyId}
and `status` = '1'
GROUP BY
ad_type
ad_spec
